about_the_game: Paradigm Island is a Narrative RPG where everyday surrealism meets dry wit. Figure out what kind of person you are and piece together a perplexing mystery by getting to know the people you meet on the way. Use the skills of your liking, whilst trying not to get lost in your own psyche.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes foul language and talk of drugs, sex, and death. In the game, player can also use drugs and alcohol. The game's themes revolve around corporate greed and poverty.

detailed_description: Paradigm Island is a Narrative RPG where everyday surrealism meets dry wit. Use the skills of your liking, whilst trying not to get lost in your own psyche.
name: Paradigm Island Demo
